MotionDesign.name: Motion design
MotionDesign.description: I always loved to draw abstract things on paper. That interest actually helped me to relax and to survive many boring work-meetings. And many years later, my path crossed with After Effects. Our friendship is growing each day..

Music.name: Listening to music
Music.description: Music is a basic need of my survival. It gets me excited, or make them calm and relaxed(even if it is very heavy).

Watching.name: Watching stuff
Watching.description: Life can be boring, and can be hard to change, but it is easy to change what you watch.
